options-complete/.data_quality: Professional grade CSV with Greeks - Higher quality/more complete

options-2010/.note: Subset of data already in options-complete/

data_volume_summary.daily_coverage: Most trading days covered for available years
data_volume_summary.data_format: Consistent CSV format across all directories

data_quality_assessment.format_consistency: Excellent - identical schema across all years
data_quality_assessment.completeness: High - includes bid/ask, volume, open interest, Greeks

immediate_actions: Use options/ directory for 2009 data (critical year for target period)
Use options-complete/ for 2010-2012 data (best quality available)
Build unified data pipeline combining both sources
Focus initial backtesting on 2009-2012 period with available data
data_gap_solutions: Consider CBOE historical data for recent years
Explore Polygon.io, Alpha Vantage, or IEX Cloud APIs
Check if any ZIP files in bucket contain newer options data
Look for compressed/archived data in aws_backup/ directory
strategic_options: Option 1: Focus on 2009-2012 period with available high-quality data
Option 2: Acquire external data for complete 2009-2024 coverage
Option 3: Use available data for strategy development, external data for validation
Option 4: Implement hybrid approach combining multiple data sources

best_practices.caching_strategy: Download and cache frequently used date ranges
best_practices.processing_notes: Large file sizes suggest comprehensive daily snapshots

estimated_processing_requirements.memory_requirements: 8-16 GB RAM for processing large daily files
estimated_processing_requirements.processing_time: Several hours for complete historical analysis
estimated_processing_requirements.recommended_chunking: Process by month or quarter for large analyses

integration_roadmap.phase_2: Build unified data interface combining both directories
integration_roadmap.phase_3: Develop backtesting framework for available period
integration_roadmap.phase_4: Research and integrate external data for 2013-2024
